product_name: Marin Terra Linda SC2 Women's Bike - 2014
long_description: Getting out the door for errands or commutes is easy on the Marin Terra Linda SC2 women's bike. Its heads-up positioning and entry-level Shimano parts change routine outings into daily adventures. Hydroformed, triple-butted 6061 aluminum frame features sporty road bike geometry that's designed specifically for women. Upright positioning reduces strain on the hands, wrists and shoulders, and increases the rider's field of vision. Shimano triple crankset and an 8-speed cassette provide 24 gears for handling everything from climbs to flat-land cruising. Shimano shifters and derailleurs move you smoothly from gear to gear. Alloy linear-pull brakes offer reliable stopping. Continental Contact II 700x32c road tires provide a sporty ride with puncture protection. Marin speed saddle is contoured for all-day comfort and anatomic support. Platform pedals accommodate most casual shoes. The Marin Terra Linda SC2 women's bike specs are subject to change.
